properties.descriptio: Dry Arch Growers is a community-supported agricultural project that runs it's own box scheme in Bathampton. Dry Arch Growers welcome all volunteers and visitors and co-ordinate  regular work days and gardening sessions for members of the community

properties.address: Denny Lane, Chew Magna, Bristol, Bath and North East Somerset BS40 8SZ
properties.descriptio: The Community Farm is a community-owned social enterprise growing and selling organic food through a box delivery scheme. The farm welcomes visitors and provides regular volunteering opportunities and events
